Senator Rubio continues to work to ensure that Floridians stranded abroad due to the #coronavirus pandemic are brought home safely.

Important information and resources to assist #FloridiansStuckAbroad are found below⬇️

https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/_cache/files/20e74c90-ac60-4227-a7fd-a50c5a429481/D10C63C7653FABA5F5F5EC74FF4E2B21.usc-abroad-help.pdf
Very excited to announce my new book, “One Vote Away”! https://apnews.com/5ffd3699afcfb87ed2e550761f2340ef

With more than 33M Americans out of work as a result of #COVID19, our priority in Congress needs to be our nation’s recovery – reducing taxes and lifting burdensome regulations on local businesses so they can survive and provide the jobs Americans need to come back. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1258864018103681024/img/j9b4MsY1F6fCWGlO.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1258864018103681024/vid/480x270/mLP2gNN5VBYePvdm.mp4?tag=13

So excited about this new documentary highlighting civil rights icon and my personal hero, John Lewis. Please watch and share this trailer—and mark your calendars for July 3rd! #JohnLewisIsGoodTrouble https://twitter.com/JohnLewisDoc/status/1259875916978610177 QT @JohnLewisDoc Thousands of protests. 45 arrests. 33 years in Congress. Sometimes change calls for a little trouble. John Lewis: Good Trouble comes to theaters and on demand July 3rd. #JohnLewisIsGoodTrouble http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXcqudaUcAEfJMZ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1258519573197803520/vid/480x270/CFMRPGUss8YnfDTb.mp4?tag=13

In this episode: I hit back at @60Minutes' hit piece, take a deeper dive into #Obamagate, and divulge the latest on my White House meeting with @POTUS.

Are your ears so stuffed with lobbyist money that you can’t hear the American people, @SenateMajLdr McConnell? https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1259941112980127746 QT @thehill McConnell said there isn't need yet for fifth coronavirus relief bill: "I don’t think we have yet felt the urgency of acting immediately" https://thehill.com/homenews/senate/497173-mcconnell-no-need-yet-for-fifth-coronavirus-bill http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXw1w-GWAAQb_FT.jpg

This is sick and twisted. Political disagreements are fine, but—especially in a time of crisis—we need more love in the world and less hate. #OneAmerica https://jezebel.com/i-will-personally-be-thrilled-if-stephen-miller-dies-of-1843348268

RT @JesseFFerguson The GOP Congress is now openly embracing and encouraging Super Spreaders of coronavirus. 

https://www.politico.com/news/2020/05/11/conservative-protest-lockdown-243638

Scientists are racing to come up with tests, treatments, & a vaccine for COVID-19 – but if we don’t have swabs, vials, & other medical supplies, we can’t distribute them at scale. I spoke with NIH & HHS experts about why we need to publicly manufacture COVID-19 supplies. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXvq3i3X0AIE1TS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1259855557927882752/vid/480x270/TmyyTrK907aLwaTq.mp4?tag=13

Congratulations Nicholas Johnson! You may be the first, but I know you won't be the last. Keep using your gifts to show the next generation of young Black leaders what’s possible.
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/11/nyregion/nicholas-johnson-princeton-black-valedictorian.html

To recover and heal, we must work to build a new normal. A new normal in which access to health care is expanded, the minimum wage is raised, and racial health disparities are eliminated.
https://www.essence.com/feature/to-build-a-new-normal-start-now/

The Chinese Communist Party has systematically subverted global organizations to advance their agenda. The @WHO’s exclusion of Taiwan amidst a global pandemic is just one example of CCP’s dangerous influence.
https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-who-and-taiwan-11588978457

I find it interesting that now that the coronavirus has hit the White House, Donald Trump is now suddenly a big supporter of testing. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1259942782380265472/img/zDAnlrKVejDmucq7.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1259942782380265472/vid/320x320/unhRiUe3Gi-wsH2I.mp4?tag=13

Welcome move by the President. It’s outrageous that 5 unelected bureaucrats wanted to invest the retirement savings of members of the U.S. military in Chinese companies actively working against the interests they are sworn to protect. https://www.foxbusiness.com/markets/trump-orders-federal-retirement-money-invested-in-chinese-equities-to-be-pulled

ICYMI on @MichaelBerrySho: Elected officials don’t have the right to demand apologies from citizens. That’s not how it works in this country. Even after knowing full well the havoc that this crisis is wreaking on our economy, the Trump administration has yet to come up with a bold, concrete plan to prevent economic devastation. It’s inexcusable.
https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2020/05/trump-officials-have-bad-news-about-the-economy/

We need a change when one in five mothers has hungry children. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXyI6uhUEAAgmNf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1260032061747818499/vid/480x270/TDNeaDkZYaWeaJJg.mp4?tag=13

I'm calling for an independent federal investigation into Ahmaud Arbery's killing. The video was a sickening display of the killing of an unarmed Black man in broad daylight. His family deserves justice. #JusticeForAhmaud

Trump is trying to tweet his way into flipping #CA25—we won’t let him. 

Tomorrow, voters have the chance to elect @ChristyforCA25 to Congress. This race is close and every dollar counts to getting her over that finish line. Can you chip in now?

This crisis has ravaged nursing homes in New Jersey and across the country. I'm working with @SenBlumenthal on legislation that would provide workers in senior care facilities with the training and equipment they need to keep their residents safe. 
https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2020/05/09/us/coronavirus-cases-nursing-homes-us.html

Thank you to all the men and women of our U.S. Armed Forces. From protecting us from threats both foreign and domestic to helping Americans #CombatCOVID19 here at home, we are grateful for your commitment to serving our country, and we salute you. #MilitaryAppreciationMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXxFg-UXQAIBgs9.jpg

Pretty pathetic. Mr. Trump is a coward who tears down others to make himself feel powerful. https://twitter.com/axios/status/1259959091704799233 QT @axios The final minute of Trump's news conference this evening http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1259959047442386947/img/rpy0DYJzmZBIQZPC.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1259959047442386947/vid/480x270/-Cved6lsW0JhC0js.mp4?tag=13

Every one of the 30 million unemployment claims since the start of the #coronavirus crisis is a story of devastating financial hardship. 

Stopping its spread with testing, tracing, and treatment is how we start to recover by restoring public health and consumer confidence. https://twitter.com/cnnpolitics/status/1259797413491064832 QT @CNNPolitics Why state reopenings have sent projected coronavirus death rates back up | Analysis https://trib.al/jHCRtHA http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXuzEkrWoAA3C1J.jpg

While the top 1% own twice as much wealth as the bottom 99% of humanity, 420 million people throughout the world are in danger of slipping into extreme poverty and 30 million children are at risk of dying from hunger. We cannot allow that to happen. https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2020-05-11/more-than-a-billion-people-escaped-poverty-in-the-last-20-years-the-coronavirus-could-erase-those-gains

In April, 26.4 percent of workers lost their jobs or had their hours reduced. 

During this horrific crisis, we have got to guarantee everyone in America $2,000 a month, a paycheck and health care. 

The American people can't afford to wait. They need help now.

RT @ASAMorg Addiction is treatable. And this bipartisan request will save lives.  Thank you @SenWarren , @SenMarkey , @SenStabenow, @SenMurphyOffice, @RepJoeKennedy, @RepPaulTonko, @RepJohnKatko, @DorisMatsui and so many others! https://twitter.com/SenWarren/status/1259278591659040768 QT @SenWarren If treatment services for opioid & other substance use disorders shut down from this crisis, millions of Americans will lose access to lifesaving care. I’ve urged Congress to provide emergency funds for behavioral health orgs in the next relief package. https://www.nationaljournal.com/s/706621/addiction-services-face-closures-cutbacks-amid-covid-19-outbreak

Well done, @Garrett_FoxNews. Awesome to see another #CombatCOVID19Challenge completed! https://twitter.com/Garrett_FoxNews/status/1259945122290073619 QT @Garrett_FoxNews Thank you @DavidSpunt for the #CombatCOVID19Challenge

RT @JoeBiden Donald Trump hopes to split us into dueling camps, casting Democrats as doomsayers hoping to keep America grounded and Republicans as freedom fighters trying to liberate the economy.

It’s a childish tactic—and a false choice none of us should fall for. https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2020/05/11/joe-biden-coronavirus-op-ed/

While working people struggle to survive, the rich reach unthinkable levels of wealth.

The annual cost of chemotherapy for all cancer patients: $9 billion.

Jeff Bezos made that much in about 40 days in 2018. 

We can and must build a system based on justice and dignity for all.

In the past few weeks I’ve introduced legislation that would:
✅Provide people $2,000 monthly payments throughout this crisis
✅Establish a racial & ethnic disparities task force
✅Get money in the hands of minority-owned & micro-businesses

People are suffering. We must act—now.

“It is necessary for us to undergo many hardships to enter the kingdom of God.”

Acts 14:22

Voting in person holds great significance for Black voters—for whom the right to vote was hard won. My VoteSafe Act would ensure in-person voting is safe for those who want or need it. https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/09/politics/black-voters-mail-in-voting/index.html

As Attorney General, William Barr has consistently put the president's political interests above the rule of law. His leadership is eroding the Justice Department's integrity.

I'm in agreement with these former DOJ career officials: he must resign. https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/2000-doj-officials-call-ag-barr-resign-flynn/story?id=70615677

A one-time $1,200 payment is nowhere near enough. Congress must immediately pass my bill to help people make ends meet. 
https://www.essence.com/news/politics/coronavirus-legislation-2000-check-democrats/

The #COVID19 crisis exposed just how fragile our food system is when large, multinational corporations like Smithfield control so much. My bill would reform this broken system. Grateful to have @SenWarren & @reprokhanna join me in this fight. https://thehill.com/homenews/senate/496661-booker-renews-push-to-phase-out-factory-farming-by-2040-after-pandemic-hits

Coronavirus poses a threat to free and fair elections. But we can fix that.

We need vote by mail. We need online and same-day registration. We need early voting and extended voting hours. We need real money for governments to administer elections safely.
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/05/magazine/voting-by-mail-2020-covid.html

Trump is completely out of touch with what families are facing.

No, we can't take a “pause” on putting money in the pockets of the American people who have been staring down at past due notices for the last months while his special interest friends grow richer. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1260014900929232899/pu/img/dC3A_XjOp6HvKHNQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1260014900929232899/pu/vid/480x270/SUQYIrAtZhtESaMg.mp4?tag=10

Cost of never ending wars in Middle East: $6,400,000,000,000

Cost of Trump's defense budget: $738,000,000,000

Cost of inaction: Another Great Depression

We cannot afford to wait. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-05-11/gop-finds-deficit-scold-voice-again-adding-snag-to-talks-on-aid

As we continue to honor the victims of Santa Fe, please join me in remembering Christian Riley Garcia. Riley heroically died helping fellow students escape. He dreamed of joining the Army, so today we remember him by wearing red, white, or blue.

Contact tracing is a good way to stop COVID-19 from spreading in the White House – and everywhere else. Congress should include my plan with @RepAndyLevin to stand up a national contact tracing program in the next relief bill. https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/11/politics/katie-miller-contract-tracing-coronavirus/index.html

Cities should be able to deliver meals from local restaurants to vulnerable people. It’s a common sense solution to feed hungry people and lift up restaurants and suppliers on the brink of collapse.

I Introduced the FEED Act last week to make it easier for cities to do that.

Bill Barr has repeatedly acted like the president’s personal attorney by advancing Trump’s political interests when his job is to work for the American people and the rule of law. This agency is truly in crisis—Barr must resign. https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/justice-department/2-000-former-doj-fbi-officials-call-barr-resign-over-n1204601

#COVID19 #Coronavirus http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXvRXmvWoAYWi4F.jpg

They’re right. 

William Barr chose to play politics with Trump and his cronies over ensuring equal justice under law on day one—and never looked back. 

He should have resigned a long time ago. https://twitter.com/keithboykin/status/1259882081481641986 QT @keithboykin Nearly 2,000 former Justice Department employees call for Attorney General Bill Barr to resign.

Shout out to everyone who just joined us for an impromptu IG Live!

In less than an hour, we raised $12k for @domesticworkers to help support house cleaners, nannies, and care workers across the country during COVID 💪🏽💕 https://twitter.com/rtrafa_/status/1260032891909619714 QT @rtrafa_ @AOC went live on IG to chat with her followers, fold her laundry, and fundraise for the National Domestic Workers Alliance. In under an hour, she received over 900 donations and more than $12K. The averaged donation was $13.29.
I’m proposing $2,000 monthly payments throughout the pandemic and for 3 months after, because rent and bills are still due during this crisis and people are going hungry. It’s that basic.

How absurd is it that we have completely ignored the need to create an efficient unemployment system?

The establishment's contempt for working-class people is a sickness. https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/5dzmyk/our-broken-unemployment-system-is-a-national-scandal?utm_campaign=sharebutton

Californians: @ChristyforCA25 is on the ballot for tomorrow's special election in the 25th Congressional District. Vote to send Christy to Congress to fight for working families, and send a message that Californians reject President Trump's hateful agenda. https://twitter.com/ChristyforCA25/status/1259962682884546561 QT @ChristyforCA25 The choice in this race couldn’t be more clear. Mike Garcia sides with Donald Trump 100%. I won’t - and I will always put the people of our community first above all else. Help us protect this seat in tomorrow's MAY 12 SPECIAL ELECTION! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1255532491185717262/pu/img/pGG43WMYUTpeW4wv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1255532491185717262/pu/vid/480x270/VxLjEkPQwxyvztoa.mp4?tag=10

Top oil and gas CEOs made $8,600 an hour in 2018—they got in *nine minutes* what ordinary Americans got as a one-time $1,200 coronavirus check.

No, we do not need to bail out fossil fuel CEOs—we need sustained, economic protection for working families. https://truthout.org/articles/fossil-fuels-already-get-billions-in-bailouts-theyre-called-subsidies/

When it comes to this #CoronavirusPandemic, we’ve got to have a balanced approach – one that uses reasonable strategies to prevent the spread of the virus while also allowing people to safely get back to work and earn a living again. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1259992635177078788/img/FduTL16bwXvSZF3d.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1259992635177078788/vid/480x270/vt3lLZD_gRs5orKU.mp4?tag=13

It’s unbelievable just how far the mainstream media will go to obfuscate the fact that the Chinese Communist Party covered up the spread of #COVID19, persecuted brave doctors who tried to sound the alarm, and allowed the initial outbreak in Wuhan to become a global pandemic. https://twitter.com/statedeptspox/status/1259694260242264065 QT @statedeptspox .@CBSNews intentionally misled its viewers with a report Sunday evening that failed to accurately portray the clear intent of Secretary Pompeo's remarks to Martha Raddatz on ABC News regarding the origin of the virus in Wuhan, China.
